articles.title: Essay | Was Hip-Hop Really Invented 50 Years Ago? - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: A legendary party in the Bronx in the summer of 1973 helped usher in a new musical era, but it’s too much to call it the birth of the genre
articles.content: The music world has been gearing up for Aug. 11, which will be widely celebrated as the 50th anniversary of the birth of hip-hop. The story goes like this: On that date in 1973, in the rec room of an… [+507 chars]
